endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all users within the system, including their associated roles and permissions.
Create a new user account, including username, email, and initial role assignment.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific user by their unique identifier.
Update account details for the specified user, such as changing their associated roles or permissions.
Delete the specified user account from the system.
Initiate multifactor authentication setup for a user, providing additional security measures.
Retrieve a list of all defined roles and their associated permissions.
Create a new role with specified permissions for assignment to users.
Update details of an existing role, such as modifying its permissions.
Remove a specific role from the system, ensuring no dependencies exist.
